name: Mediterranean Meatballs Power Bowl
description: Not your grandma’s salad! This power bowl is packed with lean protein and tasty veggies to power you through your day, with herbaceous flavours that will have you coming back for more. Fennel has an anise flavour (think black licorice!) with vitamins and minerals that support heart health and reduce inflammation. And don't let beets’ earthy flavour deter you—this ruby red superfood is high in fibre, potassium, and anti-inflammatory nutrients.

ingredients.name: Chicken Souvlaki Seasoning or Donair Seasoning

preparation: In a large bowl, use a fork to combine ground turkey and seasoning. Form into 16 meatballs (about 2 tbsp each).
Arrange in a single layer in Round Steamer or Multipurpose Steamer (it’s okay if the meatballs touch each other). Cover and microwave on high for 4 min or until cooked through.
Thinly slice fennel and beet, and dice cucumber.
Divide leafy greens, fennel, beet, and cucumber between four bowls. Top each bowl with four meatballs. Drizzle with dressing.
tips: Use 4-in-1 Mandoline fitted with 1.5 mm slicer plate to thinly slice fennel and beet.

products.name: Chicken Souvlaki Seasoning (Pkg of 3)
summary: A Greek-inspired meal, souvlaki is marinated meat grilled on a skewer, often served with warm pita bread and tzatziki. No grill? No problem. Skip the skewers and put your Sheet Pan to work to make equally tasty Chicken Souvlaki in 20 minutes in the oven.

products.name: Donair Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Any way you name it – gyro, shawarma, donair, or doner kebab – our Donair Seasoning is what you’re looking for. You won’t believe how easy it is to make the street food staple at home in minutes with this blend and a few simple ingredients. Just add the seasoning to ground beef, press it into a Rectangular Steamer and cook it in the microwave for 10 minutes or the oven for 60. Slice thinly and serve on a pita with fresh veggies and tzatziki – dinner is done!

products.name: Greek Dressing Mix
summary: Herbs make salad dressings taste great, but they can be a pain to buy and use while fresh. Enter our Greek Dressing to solve the problem. Packed with only good food ingredients, including garlic, oregano, mint, and zero additives, it’s easy to make your own healthy dressing with this simple blend. Just mix it with olive oil and red wine vinegar and give it a shake. Add crumbled feta or Greek yogurt for a creamier dressing.

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.

products.name: 4-in-1 Mandoline
summary: Perfect for cutting thin slices & shredding veggies. 4 slicer settings: 2 slice & 2 julienne options.
